subject: Baseball
Wood and Wood Products
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Sam Holman, the founder of the Original Maple Bat Corporation and the father of maple bats, thinks the quality of wood used in some bats may be responsible for the way they splinter.
snippet: Sam Holman, the founder of the Original Maple Bat Corporation and the father of maple bats, thinks the quality of wood used in some bats may be responsible for the way they splinter.
